## About Me

I am a PhD student at the University of Colorado Boulder. I fields are american politics and methodology. My primary research interest regards the political implications of the built environment. I am an Instituite of Behavioral Science (IBS) affiliate in the population department; a member of the American Political Research Lab (APRL); and a member of the Race, Ethnicity, and Politics (REP) lab. When not studying, you can find me at a music festival, building legos, or attempting to stay fit.
